alert.note: Alert for Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marion County through 630 PM EDT... At 537 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Dunnellon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
